Segment.name: TD5
Segment.comment: To specify the carrier and sequence of routing and provide transit time information

Field.name: RoutingSequenceCode
Field.comment: Code describing the relationship of a carrier to a specific shipment movement

Field.name: IdentificationCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

Field.name: IdentificationCode
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

Field.name: TransportationMethodTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the method or type of transportation for the shipment

Field.name: Routing
Field.comment: Free-form description of the routing or requested routing for shipment, or the originating carrier's identity

Field.name: ShipmentOrderStatusCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the status of an order or shipment or the disposition of any difference between the quantity ordered and the quantity shipped for a line item or transaction

Field.name: LocationIdentifier
Field.comment: Code which identifies a specific location

Field.name: TransitDirectionCode
Field.comment: The point of origin and point of direction

Field.name: TransitTimeDirectionQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying the value of time used to measure the transit time

Field.name: TransitTime
Field.comment: The numeric amount of transit time

Field.name: ServiceLevelCode1
Field.comment: Code indicating the level of transportation service or the billing service offered by the transportation carrier

Field.name: ServiceLevelCode2
Field.comment: Code indicating the level of transportation service or the billing service offered by the transportation carrier

Field.name: ServiceLevelCode3
Field.comment: Code indicating the level of transportation service or the billing service offered by the transportation carrier
